com.github.uberroot.NCJBot

Class RemoteNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.uberroot.NCJBot.RemoteNode

  • public class RemoteNode
extends java.lang.Object

    This class is responsible for holding data about remote nodes and handling the underlying socket communication.

    Author:
    Carter Waxman

           throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Deprecated. Use RemoteNode(String, int) instead.
        Creates an instance of a RemoteNode with the host/port pair.
        Parameters:
        ip - IPv4 address or hostname of the machine running the node.
        port - TCP Port on which the node listens.

        java.net.UnknownHostException
